<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Security Group Permissions</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/securitygroups/permissions"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Manage permissions related to security groups in user's account.
